New Records: Glenn Maxwell scored 120 not out from 55 balls, equalling Rohit Sharma's record for the most T20I centuries with his fifth in the format
Key Match Events: Maxwell's innings included eight sixes and 12 fours, helping Australia set their highest T20I score on home soil
He turned the game around after a slow start, adapting his strategy and making crucial shots
His century was the second-highest by a batter coming in at No.4 or below in T20Is
Post-Match Reflections: Maxwell expressed confidence in his batting form, stating he feels'really clear' when he's in the middle
He admitted to frustration early in the innings but adjusted his approach to secure the win
He highlighted the difficulty of batting at No.4 but enjoyed the challenge of changing momentum in the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: Maxwell's performance set up a series win for Australia against the West Indies
His batting at No.4 has been a key position for him, allowing him to adapt to various scenarios
